alert.note: Alert for Jackson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 10 at 9:55AM CDT until August 10 at 12:00PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CDT TODAY FOR SOUTHEASTERN JACKSON COUNTY... At 955 AM CDT, Emergency management reported flash flooding from the earlier heavy rain. Multiple roadways are flooded in Moss Point, including Frederik Street and Rose Drive. Between 3 and 7 inches of rain have fallen. Additional rainfall amounts up to one-half inch are possible in the warned area. Flash flooding is already occurring. HAZARD...Life-threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Emergency management reported. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Moss Point, Escatawpa, Gautier and Helena. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 10 in Mississippi between mile markers 65 and 73. FLASH FLOOD...OBSERVED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
